languages.text: When a diseased creature dies, it creates a toxic area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} and deals 7 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} to any creature that enters the area or starts its round inside it. These creatures must also pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or gain +1 stack of the Shadow Quarters disease effect.
languages.original_text: Когда зараженное существо погибает, оно создает токсичную область вокруг себя на 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Каждый, кто входит в эту область или начинает свой ход внутри нее, получает 7 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичного урона{/g}, а также выполняет {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}. При провале цели получают 1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффекта{/g} болезни теневых кварталов.

traits.locale_text: When an diseased creature dies, it creates a toxic area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} and deals 7 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} to any creature that enters the area or starts their round inside it. These creatures must also pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or gain +1 stack of Shadow Quarters disease {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}.

When a diseased creature dies, it creates a toxic area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} and deals 7 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} to any creature that enters the area or starts its round inside it. These creatures must also pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or gain +1 stack of the Shadow Quarters disease effect.

languages.text: Когда зараженное существо погибает, оно создает токсичную область вокруг себя на 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Каждое существо, которое входит в эту область или начинает свой ход внутри нее, получает 7 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичного урона{/g}, а также выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}. При провале цели получают +1 уровень эффекта "болезнь теневых кварталов".
languages.original_text: When a diseased creature dies, it creates a toxic area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} and deals 7 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} to any creature that enters the area or starts its round inside it. These creatures must also pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or gain +1 stack of the Shadow Quarters disease effect.

languages.text: Stirbt eine kranke Kreatur, erzeugt sie einen toxischen Bereich, der jeder Kreatur, die den Bereich betritt oder ihre Runde darin beginnt, 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang 7 Punkte {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxischen Schaden{/g} zufügt. Misslingt die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}- {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g}, wird die Kreatur außerdem mit +1 Stapel des Schattenquartiere-Effektes belegt.
languages.original_text: When a diseased creature dies, it creates a toxic area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} and deals 7 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} to any creature that enters the area or starts its round inside it. These creatures must also pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or gain +1 stack of the Shadow Quarters disease effect.

traits.locale_text: Stirbt eine kranke Kreatur, erzeugt sie einen toxischen Bereich, der jeder Kreatur, die den Bereich betritt oder ihre Runde darin beginnt, 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang 7 Punkte {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxischen Schaden{/g} zufügt. Misslingt die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}- {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g}, wird die Kreatur außerdem mit +1 Stapel des Schattenquartiere-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effektes{/g} belegt.

languages.text: Cuando una criatura enferma muere, crea una zona tóxica que dura 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g} e inflige 7 de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g} a cualquier criatura que entre en la zona o empiece su turno en el interior. Estas criaturas deberán superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} u obtener +1 acumulación del {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} Enfermedad de los barrios bajos.
languages.original_text: When a diseased creature dies, it creates a toxic area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} and deals 7 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} to any creature that enters the area or starts its round inside it. These creatures must also pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or gain +1 stack of the Shadow Quarters disease {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando una criatura enferma muere, crea una zona tóxica que dura 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g} e inflige 7 de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g} a cualquier criatura que entre en la zona o empiece su turno en el interior. Estas criaturas deberán superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} u obtener +1 acumulación del {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} Enfermedad de los barrios bajos.

languages.text: 病気の生き物が死んだ時、3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}有効な毒性領域を生み出し、エリア内に入ったまたはラウンドを開始した生き物全てに7 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒性ダメージ{/g}を負わせる。生き物は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}耐性試験{/g}を受かる、または+1 影地区病{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}エフェクト{/g}を得る必要がある。
languages.original_text: When a diseased creature dies, it creates a toxic area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} and deals 7 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} to any creature that enters the area or starts its round inside it. These creatures must also pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or gain +1 stack of the Shadow Quarters disease {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 病気の生き物が死んだ時、3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}有効な毒性領域を生み出し、エリア内に入ったまたはラウンドを開始した生き物全てに7 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒性ダメージ{/g}を負わせる。生き物は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}耐性試験{/g}を受かる、または+1 影地区病{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}エフェクト{/g}を得る必要がある。

languages.text: 当染病生物死亡时，会形成一片有毒区域，持续三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。当任何生物进入这片区域，或在这片区域内开始回合时，会受到7点{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}。受到毒素影响的生物还需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，未能通过检定的生物会获得1层“阴影区疫病”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}。
languages.original_text: When a diseased creature dies, it creates a toxic area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} and deals 7 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} to any creature that enters the area or starts its round inside it. These creatures must also pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or gain +1 stack of the Shadow Quarters disease {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当染病生物死亡时，会形成一片有毒区域，持续三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。当任何生物进入这片区域，或在这片区域内开始回合时，会受到7点{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}。受到毒素影响的生物还需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，未能通过检定的生物会获得1层“阴影区疫病”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}。

languages.text: Lorsqu'une créature infectée meurt, crée une zone toxique qui dure 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} et inflige 7 points de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g} à toute créature qui y entre ou y commence son round. Ces créatures doivent également passer un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g}, sans quoi elles gagnent +1 cumul de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} Maladie des Quartiers des Ombres.
languages.original_text: When a diseased creature dies, it creates a toxic area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} and deals 7 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} to any creature that enters the area or starts its round inside it. These creatures must also pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or gain +1 stack of the Shadow Quarters disease {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'une créature infectée meurt, crée une zone toxique qui dure 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} et inflige 7 points de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g} à toute créature qui y entre ou y commence son round. Ces créatures doivent également passer un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g}, sans quoi elles gagnent +1 cumul de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} Maladie des Quartiers des Ombres.
